title: First Look at Helium 10 for KDP Niche Research

tactics.name: Sort Products by Sales Data
tactics.description: Use Helium 10's Black Box tool to filter products by monthly sales units and identify top-performing items in a niche.
steps: Input niche phrase into Black Box
Sort results by monthly sales units high to low
caveats: Seasonal trends may skew BSR rankings
source_quotes: sorted by monthly sales units high to low and you can see the paper lined notebook hardcover and it's the number one seller

tactics.name: BSR + Price Tracking
tactics.description: Use Helium 10 to view sales rank, list price, and new price at a glance for quick research
source_quotes: you can see at a glance all the information to include the bsr

heuristics.name: Prioritize High-Volume Keywords
heuristics.condition: If search volume trend is high then prioritize keywords
source_quotes: search volume trend high to low and what you can see here is the search volume

heuristics.name: Low Review Boost
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize keywords
source_quotes: you typically need a paid tool from what i've seen to get that

claims.statement: Helium 10's Black Box tool can identify top-selling products in a niche by sorting monthly sales data.
source_quotes: sorted by monthly sales units high to low and you can see the paper lined notebook hardcover and it's the number one seller

claims.statement: BSR rankings require paid tools for accurate data
source_quotes: you typically need a paid tool from what i've seen to get that

niche_patterns.description: Target niche audiences with specific organizational needs and affordability concerns.
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Balances functional demand with price sensitivity for niche products.
source_quotes: this book sells really well this is a very powerful feature
